data.title: A train wreck for anyone over 25
data.text: Guys in tank tops (50 degree weather by the way), trash everywhere, no horizontal surface is anything less than adhesive, the courtesy of a mosh pit......a little slice of the worst of Bourbon Street right in downtown Tallahassee.

data.title: Most popular bar in downtown Tallahassee
data.text: This bar is an institution in Tally...very popular every evening with FSU, FAMU, and Tallahassee Community College students...very popular with lobbyists and legislators...locally-owned and operated...

data.title: Good place to gawk at politicians
data.text:
Clyde's and Costello's is THE in bar when the legislature is in session during March and April. 

Located just a half block north of the Capitol on Adams Street, "Clyde's" is a favorite gathering place in the late afternoon for mostly politicians and lobbyists who meet to discuss the day's legislative events over libations and snacks.

As such, much like a zoo, it's a great place for people watching and though you likely won't be aware of it, if you're a Florida resident, deals which will affect your future significantly are likely being cut right before your eyes.

The bar has outside seating and that's the best place to be as you watch the power people glad handing contributors and supporters while scurrying from one cocktail party to another among the bistros and clubs along and across the street.

The drinks are decent and reasonably priced as well.

data.title: Fun place to go if you like to have fun!
data.text: I've been to Clyde's twice for the evening bar scene and it is great. Once they had live music and once they had a DJ. Lots of fun and the drink prices are great! Young college crowd late in the evening and lots of fun.

data.title: Disappointing to see an old favorite deteriorate like this
data.text: One of the few places you can drink and smoke inside, including cigars and pipes.  Smells nasty all the time now.  It seems dirtier and dingier than ever before.  Still the place to see and be seen when networking.
